response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. Given its significance, I believe it deserves to be appreciated by someone who will cherish it as much as I have. I am offering this remarkable piece to you at a special price of $1,200,000, which I hope will make it accessible to you while still allowing me to recognize its true worth. I look forward to discussing the details with you and understanding how this product could enrich your collection or fulfill a specific need. Let's make this a win-win situation where both parties can appreciate the value and beauty of this exceptional item.", "product_price": 1200000}
